titles.title: Connected Government Act
Connected Government Act
To require a new or updated Federal website that is intended for use by the public to be mobile friendly, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

bill.summary:
Connected Government Act
This bill requires a federal agency that creates or updates a website intended for use by the public to ensure that the website is mobile friendly.
"Mobile friendly" means that the website is configured in such a way that it may be easily navigated and viewed on a smartphone, tablet computer, or similar mobile device.
